title: Synthesis of two-dimensional bismuth molybdenum oxide (2D-BMO) nanosheets and their application as fluorescent probes for the detection of explosive nitroaromatic compounds
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00517A, Paper
Shams Ur Rehman, Sivakumar Musuvadhi Babulal, Muhammad Mustafa, Hui-Fen Wu
2D-BMO fluorescent nanosheets were synthesized using a solvothermal method followed by probe sonication.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
